column4: Hello, I know this has nothing to do with ubuntu but can someone help me please. Is there any difference between 667 ddr2 ram and 800 ddr2 ram?
I would guess the 800 is faster
probably not too much.  Even for games - most data will be stored on the GFX card
on ubuntu, check out the tremulous game ( #tremulous )   its a cool 3d quake engine based game
